Package imusim :: Package visualisation :: Module rendering :: Class InteractiveAnimation

Class InteractiveAnimation

source code

Animator that renders in the WxWidgets main loop, using idle events.

Method Details

__init__(self, tMin, tMax, *renderers)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise idle animator.

Parameters:
  • tMin - Time to start animation.
  • tMax - Time at which to wrap back to tMin.
  • renderers - List of AnimatedRenderer objects.
